projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Based on the page here:

https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/mds/Module+Planning+Page

There is a suite of modules that we wish to ship with the SDK by default. This story encapsulates the idea of setting up the build, test and verification infrastructure to make such a change happen.

Currently, modules shipped with the SDK are packaged as .zip files and checked in. We need  amore flexible approach, likely one that packages a known good version of the module at build time.
fields.summary: Package "Core" modules as part of Titanium SDK
